sentences.sContent: an insidious trend towards censorship of the press
sentences.sCn: 实行新闻审查的潜在趋势

synos.tran: 阴险的；隐伏的；暗中为害的；狡猾的

remMethod.val: in (里面) + sid (坐) + ious → 坐在酒吧喝酒 → 小人之交甘如饴 → 阴险的

words.tran: 阴险地；隐伏地；暗中为害地
在不知不觉之间加剧；隐伏（阴险）

trans.tranCn: 阴险的；隐伏的；暗中为害的；狡猾的
trans.tranOther: an insidious change or problem spreads gradually without being noticed, and causes serious harm
